summary: A famous gunman becomes the marshal of Warlock to end a gang's rampages, but is met with some opposition by a former gang member turned deputy sheriff who wants to follow only legal methods.

Sickner|Mickey Simpson|Cap Somers|Bert Stevens|Jack Tornek|Joe Turkel|Tom Wilson|Harry Worth
keywords: confrontation|stabbed in the hand|sheriff's badge|double gun holster|romantic rivalry
title: El hombre de las pistolas de oro
